title: Can I download Apple Music on non-Apple devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: What does the non-Apple Devices mean? Android devices, Windows Phone or other devices developed by other companies? As we all know, except iPhone, iPod, iPad and other Apple’s devices, Apple Music is compatible with some non-Apple devices. Only if you can installed the Apple Music app on it, log into your Apple ID, you can stream Apple Music on these devices for offline listening. How to enjoy and play Apple Music on Android devices
